title: The Playboy Prince
description: Cyclamen: DiffidenceUndercover at the palace of Cordina, Lady Hannah Rothchild's very life depended on her disguise as a shy, diffident young woman. Her assignment was secureâ€”until she met Prince Bennett, because the gleam in his eye was proof positive that he couldn't refuse a challenge. And the "playboy prince" wouldn't rest until he had shattered Hannah's careful reserve...
author: Nora Roberts
